name: Infotainment by Vayu Vaidya: Episode II, Preventing Suicide
name_original: Infotainment by Vayu Vaidya: Episode II, Preventing Suicide
description:
Welcome to VayuVaidya's Infotainment channel. In this episode Preventing Suicide, learn about how Geetha, an IT manager gets help from WoeBot and from her psychiatrist and family and friends. Are you suicidal, use the predictive analytics questionnaire to find out how prone you are to suicidal tendencies and seek medical help if needed.

This skill is for informational and informal medication, for formal medical services, seek a medical specialist or call 911 for help.

VayuVaidya stands indemnified of any liabilities, through the download or use of this software.
